snippet: The police said the assailant wore a hood and a surgical mask when he slashed the throat of a Chinese exchange student, who is expected to survive.
abstract: New York City police say they are searching for man who attacked 16-year-old exchange student from China with box cutter in Queens.

byline.contributor: Nate Schweber and Jeffrey E. Singer contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The police said the assailant wore a hood and a surgical mask when he slashed the throat of a Chinese exchange student, who is expected to survive.

headline.main: Girl, 16, Attacked by Man With Box Cutter in Queens
headline.print_headline: Man Slashes at Girl’s Face as She Walks to Her School
